data.eml:eml: On the identity of some poorly known lithobiid centipedes described by Karl Verhoeff (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stoev, Pavel (2005): On the identity of some poorly known lithobiid centipedes described by Karl Verhoeff (Chilopoda: Lithobiomorpha). Zootaxa 796: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170548
